decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: PL01 Rev 1 (Location and Block Plan); PL02 Rev 1 (Existing Plans); PL03 Rev 1 (Existing Elevations); PL04 Rev 1 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PL05 Rev 1 (Proposed First Floor Plan); PL06 Rev 1 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); PL07 Rev 1 (Proposed Roof Plan); PL08 Rev 1 (Proposed Side and Rear Elevations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4  of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved single storey rear wraparound extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The hereby approved two rooflights to front roofslope shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host house and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4  of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Single storey rear wraparound extension; rear roof extension, extending over rear outrigger; installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
